alert.note: Alert for Saipan; Tinian (Marianas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 14 at 1:27PM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM CHST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. Satellite imagery shows additional showers moving into the region, with more heavy rainfall possible. * WHEN...Until 230 PM CHST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 324 AM UTC, A trained weather spotters reported heavy rain in the advisory area. This is causing urban and small stream flooding. Overflowing poor drainage areas have already caused minor flooding in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Garapan, Dandan, China Town, Tanapag, As Mahetog, Koblerville, San Jose (Tinian Municipality), Chalan Kanoa I, San Antonio, Chalan Kanoa II, Chalan Kanoa III, San Roque, Kagman, Chalan Kanoa IV, Kagman III, Gualo Rai, Afetnas, Chalan Piao, Fananganan and Chalan Laulau. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
